primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God breaks into a world of chaos and disappointment to rescue a human race that is incapable of turning itself around.

tekstueel_bewijs: God is breaking into this world order with power
He has come from the realms of glory
The only One who has the power to reverse it [history]

object.identificatie: The Rescue/Salvation of the Human Race
tekstueel_bewijs: message of new beginnings, restored relationships, a hopeful future
we must be rescued from another dimension

zender.identificatie: God the Father / The Angel Gabriel
tekstueel_bewijs: the angel Gabriel was sent from God
The proclamation of the angel is not from within this sphere
unto you is born this day... a Savior
to each and every one of you
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer is explicitly positioned as the passive Receiver of a gift.

helper.identificatie: The Angel / The Preacher / The Holy Spirit
tekstueel_bewijs: The angel of God brings news
For you whose ears are anointed by the Holy Spirit
I bring the gift of faith
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject; the Spirit is the internal Helper enabling reception.
helper.rol_van_geest: External announcer and internal enabler of faith.

tekstueel_bewijs: The human race is utterly incapable of turning itself around
sin will be vanquished... death will be overcome
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad habits but an ontological inability ('utterly incapable') and cosmic forces like death.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: There is no secondary ethical program (imperative) developed in this sermon; it remains focused on the primary soteriological event.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: N/A
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The preacher focuses entirely on the 'Inbreaking' rather than the 'Response'.

voorbeelden_god_subject: God is breaking into this world order
voorbeelden_mens_subject: The human race is utterly incapable

voorbeelden: None found (absence of 'must' for the hearer)
that is what we all want
the message of the angel is...
The human race is utterly incapable
only One who has the power to reverse it
strengthened to go against the current

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is built on the lack of human 'Pouvoir' (Power) and the total 'Pouvoir' of God. It is a classic Grace-oriented modal structure.

primaire_tegenstelling.niet_s2: Disappointment (The reality of the world without God)

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Starts with ~S1 (Magic), moves to S2 (The reality of the murdered child), then breaks through to S1 (The Kingdom) via the Incarnation.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension between magic and reality is resolved by the 'Inbreaking' of the Divine, which is more real than the world's chaos.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High. The mention of JonBenet Ramsay and the Mexican boy ensures S2 is not trivialized.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon consistently places God as the active Subject and the human as the passive, incapable recipient of a rescue from 'another dimension.'

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: The human race is utterly incapable of turning itself around under its own steam.
God is breaking into this world order with power from another sphere altogether.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Mary is mentioned but not as a model of faith to follow; she is the recipient of favor.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: Mary is the site of God's action, not the hero of the story.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and awe; removal of the burden of self-salvation.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic salvation; God does the work.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The narrative is perfectly integrated around the theme of 'Inbreaking.'

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: sin will be vanquished... death will be overcome... rescued from another dimension

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit 'anoints' the ears to allow the reception of faith.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Total inability; sin is a power that requires a 'reversal' of history.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a masterclass in theocentric narrative. God is the Subject of all significant verbs.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is for a Christmas Eve proclamation.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: Strongly identified as cosmic and humanly insurmountable.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon avoids every pitfall of moralism by ruthlessly centering the agency of God.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While rhetoric would focus on the 'magic' metaphor, Greimas reveals that the 'magic' is actually a failed actant (a false Helper).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on the Lucan text; semiotics shows how the preacher uses the Lucan structure to re-order the hearer's world.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas exposes that the preacher's 'solidarity' with the hearer is a move to place both preacher and hearer in the 'Receiver' slot, leaving the 'Subject' slot exclusively for Christ.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a pure 'Proclamation' (Kerygma) rather than 'Instruction' (Didache).
